ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, you can go to Paludal Caverns on Luclin. Take the entrance from Shadeweaver s Thicket, though. First, you can start by killing the weakest creatures near
ygData.messageBody:
Well, you can go to Paludal Caverns on Luclin. Take the entrance from
Shadeweaver's Thicket, though. First, you can start by killing the weakest
creatures near the entrance. Around 15th, you can move in and fight the
plerg fiends until the XP starts slowing down. After that, move in deeper to
kill the phlarg fiends. That can easily sustain you until close to 20th
level. I think I managed to hunt there with my ranger off and on until
around 22nd (I bounced back and forth from Lake of Ill Omen to Paludal
Caverns).

Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Techpriest [mailto:techpriest@...]
Sent: December 18, 2003 8:56 PM
To: EverQuest (E-mail)
Subject: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens


I am fairly new to EQ and have been trying various class-race combos to see
what I like. I now have three character between level 10 and 15. I have
been going to Crushbone alot to hunt, and the tower in the field of bone is
cool but I am getting tired of the same old stuff. Where else can a
character in the 10-20 range go to hunt where he can find a group easily? I
have looked over the EQ Atlas and see a lot of stuff for 1-10 and 30+.
Since I may try some more class-race combos before I try and take anybody
over 20 I could use some more places to fill the gap between newbie and
experienced. I am not interested in power-leveling.

I have EQ Evolution, so every expansion but LDON. I play on the Tunare
(sp?) server.

Thanks!
